value.title: How to share SQL tables and views using Azure Data Share | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Jie Feng joins Scott Hanselman to show how to share SQL tables and views using Azure Data Share. Azure Data Share now supports snapshot-based sharing for SQL-based sources, including Azure SQL Database and SQL Data Warehouse.
